All Classes

Class Summary
Class
Description
GameListener
The GameListener class manages the movement and action inputs the user gives
GameMenuBar
This class manages the creation and keyboard input of the menu bar and its items.
GamePanel
This class manages the painting of all the objects onto the JPanel and sets up the game.
GamePlayer
This class contains all the actions and values a player has.
Goalkeeper
This class extends the GamePlayer class but allows the Goalkeeper to move randomly.
MenubarListener
The MenubarListener class manages the actions that are performed after the user has clicked on the menu options or pressed their respective keybinds.
MiniSoccerApp
This class initializes the swing GUI, user input, and starts the game.
MiniSoccerAppTest
This class tests all the methods in the model, including the model.players.
PlayerCollection
This class contains the GamePlayers and the methods to add, remove, sort, and iterate.
PlayerCollectionIterator<T>
This class allows the usage of the iterator for the PlayerCollection
PlayerFactory
This class creates the GamePlayer instances and adds them to a private ArrayList.
PlayerStatistics
This class handles the tracking of goals made by the player and the methods to read and write values.
SoccerBall
This class manages the movement of the ball, position, and color.
SoccerGame
This class intializes and starts the game.
Striker
This class extends the GamePlayer class but allows the player to shoot the ball and move in any direction.
